name: LOOP link to Harefield West / Belfry Avenue bus stop

ai.summary: A very short, easy 0.3 km loop near Harefield West / Belfry Avenue bus stop in the UK. Suitable for all ages and ideal for a quick, low-effort stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: The loop follows urban paths and park trails. It is predominantly flat with paved sections, and may include short stretches of gravel or grass depending on the exact route.
ai.safety_notes: Plan around local traffic; obey pedestrian crossings near the bus stop. Check the forecast and daylight hours, as UK conditions can be wet and slippery. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of cyclists and other pedestrians, and supervise children. If accessibility is a concern, verify surface type and path width beforehand.
recommended_gear: Phone with maps and emergency contacts
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.
